actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to increase the minimal Federal matching rate under the aid for families with dependent children program to 75 percent.
short_title: Increased Federal Share of Welfare Costs Act of 1979

summary.text: Increased Federal Share of Welfare Costs Act of 1979 - Provides that the Federal matching rate to States beginning October 1, 1979, shall be 75 percent under title IV (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: Increased Federal Share of Welfare Costs Act of 1979
A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to increase the minimal Federal matching rate under the aid for families with dependent children program to 75 percent.
